method: Crush rhubarb with a mortar and pestle and place in a kilner jar with sugar and leave to macerate for two days. Add the cloves, cinnamon and zest and cover with vodka. Leave the  jar in a cool dark place for 3 weeks, but shake daily. Filter through muslin, re-bottle and leave for 3 months before drinking.
ingredients: 1 litre/1¾ pints vodka,  2  rhubarb sticks,  ½ lemon, zest only,  3 cloves,  1 cinnamon stick,  3 tbsp sugar
